>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/v5/repos/{owner}/{repo}/push_config"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>





<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"owner","in":"path","description":"组织(path)","required":true,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"repo","in":"path","description":"仓库(path)","required":true,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"reject_not_signed_by_gpg":{"type":"boolean","description":"只允许带有验证的签名提交"},"commit_message_regex":{"type":"string","description":"提交信息校验"},"max_file_size":{"type":"integer","description":"提交文件限制 （单位 MB）","format":"int64"},"skip_rule_for_owner":{"type":"boolean","description":"项目管理员的提交不受上述规则限制"},"deny_force_push":{"type":"boolean","description":"禁止强推（包括管理员）"}},"description":"推送规则","title":"PushConfigDto"},"example":""}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"reject_not_signed_by_gpg":{"type":"boolean","description":"只允许带有验证的签名提交"},"commit_message_regex":{"type":"string","description":"提交信息校验"},"max_file_size":{"type":"integer","description":"提交文件限制 （单位 MB）","format":"int64"},"skip_rule_for_owner":{"type":"boolean","description":"项目管理员的提交不受上述规则限制"},"deny_force_push":{"type":"boolean","description":"禁止强推（包括管理员）"}},"description":"推送规则","title":"PushConfigDto"}}},"headers":{}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
